titleStmt.title: A table shewing instantly by the eye the number of acres belonging to any summe of money according to the rate setled by Parliament upon any of the lands within the foure provinces of Ireland ...
titleStmt.author: Delamain, Richard, fl. 1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. for I. Wright, and I. Franck,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
At top: The Hvmble presentation of Richard Delamain the younger, to the right honorable House of Peers, assembled in Parliament ...
A table of land values per acre in Ulster, Conaght, Munster, and Lempster.
